name: Swarm of Prismatic Beetles
movement: walk 30 ft., fly 5 ft., burrow 20 ft.
description: A vibrant and agile swarm of tiny beetles, capable of moving quickly and occupying the same space as other creatures.
memorable: Its Glittering Carapace ability can incapacitate creatures, making it a tantalizing yet dangerous sight.
goals: To distract and incapacitate enemies using its swarm tactics and unsettling brilliance.
relations: Often encountered in the company of other insect swarms or in environments rich in natural flora.
environment: Commonly found in lush, colorful environments, especially those with plenty of plants.
strengths: Has high Dexterity allowing for maneuverability and effective evasion, and it can affect multiple enemies at once.
weaknesses: Very low Strength hampers its direct melee combat capabilities; it is vulnerable to area attacks.
attacks: Can perform Bites that deal piercing damage and potentially inflict poison damage along with a euphoric state.
most_powerful_ability: Glittering Carapace: incapacitates and immobilizes creatures within 30 feet if they fail a Wisdom saving throw.
senses: It has blindsight up to 10 feet, helping it detect nearby threats effectively.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, allowing it to avoid detection and surprise enemies.
additional_information: Has damage resistances to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks.
Immune to several conditions such as charmed, frightened, and restrained.
Can occupy and move through spaces occupied by other creatures.
Does not regain hit points, reflecting its nature as a swarm.
Utilizes its numbers for crowd control rather than individual strength.
test_queries: colorful insect swarm with incapacitating abilities
agile swarm that uses poison and euphoric effects
beetle swarm that controls the battlefield
distracting swarm that affects multiple enemies
poisonous swarm of tiny beetles in lush environments
